item.title: 渣打银行在伦敦就 15 亿英镑的伊朗制裁诉讼达成和解
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）因被指控系统性地违反对伊朗的制裁以赢得新业务而与投资者达成了价值 15 亿英镑（20 亿美元）的和解。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc has settled an investor lawsuit worth £1.5 billion ($2 billion) over allegations it systematically breached sanctions against Iran to win new business.】

item.title: 可可堆积在象牙海岸港口，买家面临现金短缺问题
item.description: 由于国际价格下跌和当地出口商资金紧张，农民们急于寻找买家，象牙海岸港口正面临着可可暂时过剩的问题。【原文：Ivory Coast is facing a temporary glut of cocoa at its ports as farmers rush to find buyers due to falling international prices and a cash crunch affecting local exporters.】

item.title: 普京的战争让俄罗斯石油业付出越来越高的代价
item.description: 对俄罗斯基础设施的攻击节奏不断加快，考验着俄罗斯的应变能力。【原文：The rising tempo of attacks on Russian infrastructure is testing the country’s resilience.】

item.title: 印度家庭的物价压力明显缓解
item.description: 印度中央银行的调查显示，印度家庭目前正目睹价格压力的显著缓解，并预计在未来 12 个月内，所有主要产品类别的价格压力都将持续。【原文：Indian households are witnessing a significant easing in price pressures now and expect it to continue over the next 12 months across all major product categories, according to surveys conducted by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: IndiGo 航班取消，数千人受困，愤怒沸腾
item.description: 印度最大的航空公司 IndiGo 频繁取消航班，导致许多人错过了婚礼，错失了商机，同时也激怒了滞留在航站楼的家人。【原文：Sweeping flight cancellations by India’s largest carrier, IndiGo, are leaving behind a trail of missed weddings and lost business opportunities — and flaring tempers with families left stranded at terminals.】

item.title: Netflix 将以 720 亿美元现金和股票收购华纳兄弟公司
item.description: Netflix Inc. 同意收购华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.【原文：Netflix Inc. agreed to buy Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. in a historic combination, joining the world’s dominant paid streaming service with one of Hollywood’s oldest and most revered studios.】

item.title: 对 OpenAI 的索拉（Sora）的热情在最初的创意爆发后逐渐消退
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，Ellen Huet 报道 OpenAI 的视频生成器 Sora。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet reports on OpenAI’s video generator, Sora, after an initial burst of interest.】

item.title: 通常的降息转嫁可能不适用于当前的美国经济
item.description: 即使美联储下周降息，经济受益的时间也可能比往常更长。【原文：Even if the Federal Reserve cuts rates next week, benefits to the economy may take longer than usual.】

item.title: 大手笔锂矿商 SQM 加入智利混合债券热潮
item.description: 在过去的四个月里，智利巨型锂生产商 SQM 已成为第三家在当地市场上出售混合票据的智利公司。【原文：The giant lithium producer SQM has become the third Chilean company to sell hybrid notes in the local market in the past four months, as companies look to finance multi-billion investments without damaging their credit score.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克和捷克亿万富翁斯特尔纳德将向欧盟提供 580 亿欧元弹药
item.description: 斯洛伐克与捷克亿万富翁米哈尔-斯特纳德（Michal Strnad）合作，提出提供价值高达 580 亿欧元（680 亿美元）的大中口径弹药，供欧盟成员国在 7 年内使用 SAFE 基金购买。【原文：Slovakia, working with Czech billionaire Michal Strnad, offered to supply up to €58 billion ($68 billion) worth of large and medium-caliber ammunition for European Union member states to purchase with SAFE funds over seven years.】

item.title: 即使美联储再次降息，美国经济可能也不会有太大起色
item.description: 美联储官员准备在下周再次降息，但对经济的任何好处都可能需要比正常情况下更长的时间才能显现出来，而且可能会被货币政策无法控制的因素所削弱。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are poised to cut interest rates again next week, but any benefit to the economy is likely to take much longer to show up than normal and may be blunted by factors that monetary policy can’t control.】

item.title: ITT 同意以 48 亿美元收购 Lone Star 旗下的 SPX Flow 公司
item.description: ITT 公司已同意以 47.75 亿美元的现金和股票交易从 Lone Star Funds 收购工业设备制造商 SPX Flow 公司。【原文：ITT Inc. has agreed to acquire industrial equipment manufacturer SPX Flow Inc. from Lone Star Funds in a $4.775 billion cash and stock deal.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布前美债将迎来六个月来最差一周
item.description: 随着投资者为一系列美国通胀和情绪数据做好准备，国债将迎来六个月来最糟糕的一周。【原文：Treasuries are on track for their worst week in six months as investors brace for a slate of US inflation and sentiment data.】

item.title: 南非队主教练伊拉斯姆斯将执教南非橄榄球队至 2031 年
item.description: 南非与拉西-伊拉斯姆斯续约四年，继续担任世界排名最高的国家橄榄球队主教练。【原文：South Africa has extended the contract of Rassie Erasmus as coach of the world’s highest-ranked national rugby team for a further four years.】

item.title: 以色列内阁支持大幅增加国防开支和减税的预算案
item.description: 以色列内阁批准了 2026 年预算，旨在维持两年冲突造成的高国防开支，同时寻求通过向中产阶级工人让步来提振紧张的经济。【原文：The Israeli cabinet approved a 2026 budget aimed at maintaining high defense spending resulting from two years of conflict, while seeking to boost the strained economy via concessions to middle-class workers.】

item.title: 法国预算终局意味着股市和债市面临压力测试
item.description: 投资者已经忍受了 18 个月法国股票和债券的低迷表现，他们即将迎来另一轮政治博弈，这有可能使情况进一步恶化。【原文：Investors who have endured 18 months of underperformance in French stocks and bonds are about to get another dose of political gamesmanship that threatens to worsen matters.】

item.title: 华尔街竞相降低人工智能借贷狂潮带来的风险
item.description: 华尔街正摩拳擦掌，准备向人工智能领域的巨头们借出巨额资金，同时也在想办法保护自己，避免因融资助长泡沫而受到影响。【原文：Wall Street is gearing up to lend massive amounts of money to the biggest players in artificial intelligence — and simultaneously trying to figure out how to protect itself from any bubble that its financing may be helping to inflate.】

item.title: 智利消费价格上涨，投资者对降息持乐观态度
item.description: 在智利中央银行 12 月政策会议召开前的最后一份通胀报告中，智利消费者物价涨幅符合预期，预计智利中央银行将在今年第二次下调借贷成本。【原文：Chile’s consumer prices rose in line with expectations in the final inflation report before the central bank’s December policy meeting, when the board is expected to cut borrowing costs for the second time this year.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司被欧盟罚款 1.2 亿欧元，这是欧盟首次根据内容法进行处罚
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 社交网络因违反欧盟有争议的内容节制法而被处以低于预期的 1.2 亿欧元（1.4 亿美元）罚款，此举仍将在言论自由和技术监管问题上引发与白宫的紧张关系。【原文：Elon Musk’s X social network was slapped with a lower-than-expected €120 million ($140 million) fine for violating the European Union’s controversial content-moderation law, in a move still set to raise tensions with the White House over free speech and tech regulation.】

item.title: 美国银行哈特内特警告美联储鸽派降息影响股市反弹
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的策略师认为，美联储对经济过于谨慎的展望可能会危及股市年底的涨势。【原文：The year-end rally in equities is at risk from a Federal Reserve outlook that’s too cautious on the economy, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 美联储 12 月降息后，经济学家认为 2026 年将有两次降息
item.description: 据彭博社调查的经济学家称，美联储官员下周将投票决定再次降息，以防范劳动力市场急剧恶化的风险上升。【原文：Federal Reserve officials will vote to cut interest rates again next week to safeguard against rising risks of a sharp deterioration in the labor market, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 马克龙表示将推动欧盟优先发展电动汽车
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）表示，在布鲁塞尔为汽车行业起草新提案时，他将支持电动汽车的 "欧洲优先选择"。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron said he’ll back a “European preference” for electric vehicles as Brussels draws up new proposals for the auto industry.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利分析师称空头袭击后买入 Trustpilot
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的一位分析师正在敦促客户买入Trustpilot Group Plc的股票，一天前，这家消费者点评公司在做空者的攻击下遭遇了创纪录的股价下跌。【原文：A Morgan Stanley analyst is urging clients to buy shares of Trustpilot Group Plc a day after the consumer-review company suffered a record share-price drop in the wake of a short-seller attack.】

item.title: 尼日利亚交易所寻求推迟征收导致股市暴跌的税收
item.description: 尼日利亚交易所寻求暂停将于 1 月生效的资本利得税上调计划，因为在多年的非正统政策使外国投资者望而却步之后，人们担心这将破坏市场复苏。【原文：The Nigerian Exchange seeks the suspension of a planned increase in capital gains tax that comes into effect in January due to fears it will derail the market recovery after years of unorthodox policies deterred foreign investors.】

item.title: 土耳其计划在巴基斯坦建立无人机设施，推动全球防务发展
item.description: 据熟知内情的土耳其官员透露，土耳其计划在巴基斯坦建立一个组装作战无人机的工厂，这是安卡拉推动其国防工业在国际市场上发展的一部分。【原文：Turkey plans to set up a facility in Pakistan to assemble combat drones, part of Ankara’s drive to boost its defense industry in international markets, according to Turkish officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百年道氏理论闪现美国股市反弹的看涨信号
item.description: 股票交易者在寻找股市将继续大幅上涨的迹象时，可能会从那些在美国公路、铁路和水路上运输货物的公司身上得到启示。【原文：Equity traders looking for signs that a blistering stock-market advance is set to continue may take their cue from the companies that move goods across America’s roads, rails and waterways.】

item.title: 第二波人工智能胜出者在亚洲蓄势待发
item.description:
随着关注点转向成本和人工智能技术的使用，MediaTek、 IsuPetasys 等公司的业绩大幅增长。【原文：

item.title: 贝恩支持的 EcoCeres 据称将考虑在香港而非伦敦上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）支持的可持续燃料生产商 EcoCeres Inc.【原文：EcoCeres Inc., a producer of sustainable fuel backed by Bain Capital, is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong instead of London, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Pimco 据称即将购买 4.5 亿欧元的 CaixaBank 贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. is set to sign an agreement to buy a Spanish mortgage portfolio worth about €450 million ($525 million) from CaixaBank SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧元区内需增长超过最初预期
item.description: 得益于投资和消费的增长，欧元区第三季度的经济增长超过了最初的报告。【原文：The euro-area economy expanded more than initially reported in the third quarter thanks to boosts in investment and consumption.】
